login.top description: Play Gomoku with your Twitch viewers
login.description1: The coordinate with the most votes is the chosen move
login.description2: Played by several streamers with 20k+ viewers

setting.title: Game Settings
setting.description1: 1. Viewers enter their desired coordinate in chat.
setting.description2: 2. The coordinate with the most votes is the next move.
setting.description3: 3. If you don't vote in time, you lose.
setting.description4: 4. You can only vote once per turn.
setting.description5: 5. The game follows the Renju rule.
setting.what is renju: Renju is an official rule that balances Gomoku, which originally favors the starting player, black. In Renju, there are forbidden moves; the black player cannot make 3x3, 4x4, or a line with more than 6 stones.
